testCases.expectedResult: Wallet connected, balance shows (1 SOL = 100k USDT)

testCases.title: Home Page Loading
testCases.description: Load home page and verify game listings
testCases.expectedResult: Home page loads with game and tournament listings

testCases.title: Lobby Navigation
testCases.description: Navigate to lobby and view active tables
testCases.expectedResult: Lobby displays all active tables with correct info

testCases.title: Leaderboard View
steps: Verify stats columns: Hands, Winnings, Win Rate
testCases.expectedResult: Leaderboard shows top 50 players correctly sorted

testCases.title: Create Cash Game
testCases.description: Create a new cash game table
testCases.expectedResult: Table created and visible in lobby

testCases.title: Create Tournament
testCases.expectedResult: Tournament created with REGISTERING status

testCases.title: Join Table as Spectator
testCases.expectedResult: Table loads, view-only mode active

testCases.title: Buy In and Sit Down
testCases.description: Purchase chips and sit at table
testCases.expectedResult: Player seated, balance decreases by 100, DB updated

testCases.title: Pre-Flop Actions
testCases.expectedResult: All actions work, pot updates, turn passes

testCases.title: Flop/Turn/River Progression
testCases.description: Verify street progression and card reveals
testCases.expectedResult: Each street shows correct number of community cards

testCases.title: Showdown and Hand Evaluation
testCases.expectedResult: Winner determined correctly, balance reflects win

testCases.title: Concurrent Games
testCases.expectedResult: Both games sync in real-time without interference

testCases.title: Profile Display
steps: View stats: hands, winnings, balance, VIP rank

testCases.expectedResult: Error shown: 'Insufficient funds', no balance change

testCases.title: Table Chat
testCases.expectedResult: Chat messages broadcast correctly with timestamps

testCases.description: Test on mobile device or browser resize

testCases.title: Load Time
testCases.expectedResult: Page loads in <2 seconds

testCases.expectedResult: UI polished, animations smooth, no glitches
